snippet.title: Harvest Moon: Hero of Leaf Valley (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Release date in North America: April 27, 2010! (Updated)
Alternative Names: 
-Harvest Moon: Sugar Village and Everyone's Wish
-(牧場物語シュガー村と皆の願い, Bokujou Monogatari: Sugar Mura to Minna no Negai

System: (PSP) PlayStation Portable

Story Line: (Wiki Source) Although the main character in many of the games has been male, some of the newer games offer the option to play as a female character. A common theme throughout the series follows the storyline wherein the player inherits a relation or an old friend's farm, and is then taken through the various aspects of farming, such as growing crops, raising livestock, making friends and ultimately finding a partner. Each game provides objects to collect or goals to complete, whether it be villagers, collecting musical notes, finding sprites, making rainbows, or ringing bells.
